snippet: A rocket company founded by Jeffrey P. Bezos, the Amazon chief executive, announced plans to use a historic launch site at Cape Canaveral.
abstract: Rocket company Blue Origin, launched by Amazon chief executive Jeffrey P Bezos, says it will build rockets and send them into orbit from Florida.
lead_paragraph: A rocket company founded by Jeffrey P. Bezos, the Amazon chief executive, announced plans to use a historic launch site at Cape Canaveral.

headline.main: Blue Origin, Jeff Bezos’ Rocket Company, to Launch From Florida
headline.print_headline: Bezos-Run Rocket Firm Will Launch in Florida
